original: Hultman, Stig, brandchef, Skövde, f. 7/9/05 i Vassända-Naglum, Älvsb. I., av dr Knut H. o.* Emmy Nymansson. G. 34 m. Siv Edfelt. Barn: Birgitta f. 35, Ulla 37, Ann 45. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 25, res:off:ex. 28, brand-chefskurs v. Kat. I. 30. Resa t. Tyskl. 29. V. brandchef i Skövde 31-37, brandchef där sed. 38. Omb. f. Städernas Försäkr :bol. sed. 39. Ordf. i Skövde komm :tj :mannafören. o. Skövde Röda kors-kår, brandkonsulent i Skarab. 1. RLSF förtj :t. i guld.
translated: Hultman, Stig, fire chief, Skövde, born September 7th, 1905 in Vassända-Naglum, Älvsborg county. Son of Dr. Knut H. and Emmy Nymansson. Married to Siv Edfelt in 1934. Children: Birgitta born in 1935, Ulla in 1937, and Ann in 1945. He completed his high school education in Halmstad in 1925, became a reserve officer in 1928, and completed the fire chief course at the Royal Institute of Technology in 1930. He traveled to Germany in 1929. He was the deputy fire chief in Skövde from 1931 to 1937, and fire chief since 1938. He was appointed as a delegate for Städernas Försäkringsbolag in 1939. He served as the chairman of Skövde's municipal committee, as well as the local branch of the Swedish Red Cross. He was also a consultant for fire safety in Skaraborg county. He received the Royal Swedish Fire Services Federation Gold Medal of Merit.

award.name: Royal Swedish Fire Services Federation Gold Medal of Merit
